SELECT b.BA_NO baNo, (select mem_id from member where mem_no = b.mem_no) memId, b.BA_TYPE baType, b.BA_TITLE baTitle, b.BA_DATE baDate, b.BA_COUNT baCount FROM board b WHERE b.ba_type='NOTICE'
AND (b.BA_TITLE LIKE '%${searchData}%' OR b.BA_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchData}%')
AND b.BA_TITLE LIKE '%${searchData}%'
AND b.BA_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchData}%'
ORDER BY baNo DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM board b WHERE b.ba_type='NOTICE'
AND (b.BA_TITLE LIKE '%${searchData}%' OR b.BA_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchData}%')
AND b.BA_TITLE LIKE '%${searchData}%'
AND b.BA_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchData}%'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BA_COUNT = BA_COUNT + 1 WHERE BA_NO =#{baNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BA_NO, b.MEM_NO, BA_TYPE, BA_TITLE, BA_CONTENT, BA_COUNT, BA_DATE , m.MEM_ID, m.MEM_NAME, m.MEM_BLACK FROM BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO WHERE BA_TYPE = 'NOTICE' and BA_NO = #{baNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BA_NO, MEM_NO, BA_TYPE, BA_TITLE, BA_CONTENT, BA_COUNT, BA_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(BA_NO),0)+1 FROM BOARD), (SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}), 'NOTICE', #{baTitle}, #{baContent}, 0, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT RP_NO ,BA_NO ,r.MEM_NO ,RP_CONTENT ,RP_DATE , m.MEM_ID, m.MEM_NAME, m.MEM_BLACK FROM REPLY r LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER m ON r.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO WHERE BA_NO = #{baNo} ORDER BY RP_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( RP_NO, BA_NO, MEM_NO, RP_CONTENT, RP_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(RP_NO),0)+1 FROM REPLY), #{baNo}, (SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}), #{rpContent}, sysdate )
